sections.title: Refund Eligibility
sections.content: Refunds are available for cancelled services before work begins, unsatisfactory service that cannot be corrected, or in case of service provider errors.

sections.title: Refund Process
sections.content: To request a refund, contact our customer service within 7 days of service completion. We will review your case and process eligible refunds within 5-10 business days.

sections.title: Non-Refundable Items
sections.content: Emergency services, diagnostic fees after service completion, and parts that have been installed cannot be refunded unless there is a warranty issue.

sections.title: Partial Refunds
sections.content: In some cases, partial refunds may be offered when only part of the service was unsatisfactory or when services were partially completed.

sections.title: Warranty vs Refund
sections.content: Issues covered under warranty will be addressed through repair or replacement rather than refund, unless repair is not possible.

sections.title: Contact for Refunds
sections.content: For refund requests or questions, contact our customer service at refunds@el7a2ny.com or call our support hotline.

metadata.title: Refund Policy - El7a2ny
metadata.description: Learn about El7a2ny's refund policy, including eligibility criteria, process, and timeframes for service refunds.
